short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When a wikibooks page has links to ogg files, the extension will insert an <audio> tag after the link.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Some wikibooks for language learning have links to audio files in ogg/oga formats, but no way to directly play the audio. This extension adds "audio" tags to the corresponding ogg/oga files.
